Package de.esoco.lib.expression.monad

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Functor<T>
    Interface of functors that wrap values of type T and allow their mapping with Functor.map(Function).
    Monad<T,M extends Monad<?,M>>
    Interface of a Functor extension that provides the monadic method Monad.flatMap(Function) for transformation into derived monads.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Call<T>
    A Monad implementation for deferred (lazy) function calls that will either supply a value or fail with an exception.
    Option<T>
    A Monad implementation for optional values.
    Promise<T>
    A monad that promises to provide a value, typically asynchronously after some background computation.
    Promise.PromiseFuture<T>
    A future implementation that wraps a promise.
    Try<T>
    A Monad implementation for the attempted execution of value-supplying operations that may fail with an exception.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Promise.State
    Enumeration of the possible states a promise can have.
